snippet: On the same day, a young Moroccan woman testified in a sex scandal involving former Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi, and Italy’s new prime minister announced the suspension of a reviled tax.
abstract: Italian Prime Min Enrico Letta announces that his three-week-old government will suspend much-reviled property tax on first homes in effort to bring some oxygen to country's economy; on same day, young Moroccan woman testifies in sex scandal involving former Prime Min Silvio Berlusconi.
lead_paragraph: On the same day, a young Moroccan woman testified in a sex scandal involving former Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi, and Italy’s new prime minister announced the suspension of a reviled tax.

headline.seo: Salacious and Sober Collide, Illustrating Hurdles for Italy’s Government
headline.main: The Salacious and the Sober Collide, Illustrating Hurdles for Italy’s Government
headline.print_headline: The Salacious and the Sober Collide, Illustrating Hurdles for Italy’s Government
